segments.text: These three hours chatting with you have been very ... interesting . Could you please tell us why we're here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want a new brand image . Something creative , something strong . Make no mistake , something with ... resolve !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's meet on Friday to discuss your progress . Give me your e-mail address ... umm , I mean addresses ... We'll be in touch .
segments.speaker: S2
